catalysts.thesis: Major insider conviction play; 10% owner V. Prem Watsa (Fairfax Financial) purchased ~$67M worth of stock, signaling a strong bottom/turnaround thesis despite recent retail headwinds.
catalysts.catalyst_details: On Jan 2, 2026, V. Prem Watsa filed Form 4 reporting the purchase of ~13.2 million shares (Class A and C) for approximately $67.4 million.
catalysts.absorption_status: Partially Absorbed; stock rose ~5.6% on Friday Jan 2, but the magnitude of the buy ($67M) suggests potential for further repricing as 'smart money' conviction is digested by the broader market.
catalysts.risk: Continued weakness in North American consumer discretionary spending.
catalysts.mispricing_evidence: The $67M insider buy is a massive deviation from typical executive purchases, yet the stock only moved ~5%, leaving an inefficiency gap.
